"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5478db116368722ad4dc0100#post_5478db116368722ad4dc0100
I was one of those guys who thought that it might be at least decent.

Since I doubt any of you have heard of Ultraseven.

It's possibly the best of the Kyodai hero subgenre of Tokusatsu.

It was created by Eiji Tsuburaya, Who helped with making the early Godzilla suits.
